location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Black and white photographs (85 x 130mm) pasted on to a sheet of paper.

mods.abstract: The item contains the following photographs:Bilad as-Shamalia (North Village) and bayHawar FortHawar Pier.The photographs accompany a statement and evidence submitted to the British Government by the Government of Bahrain relating to Bahrain's claim to sovereignty over the Hawar Islands: see letter from the Political Agent, Bahrain to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, dated 3 June 1938 (folios 109-111).
